featured.text: Which of the following is closest in meaning to the word “venture” in the second paragraph? (A) Creative measurement.

definition.zh_def: 測量的過程或結果，通常用於確定物體的大小、長度、面積或體積等。
definition.en_def: The process or result of determining the size, length, area, or volume of an object.
definition.example: The measurement of the room showed it was 20 feet long.
